name: Jewish Coffee Cake
author: sal
summary: A moist sour cream coffee cake. This is a great recipe from an old friend.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease and flour a 9x9 inch pan
Combine the flour, baking soda and baking powder; set aside
In a medium bowl, cream together the sugar, butter and eggs until smooth
Add the flour mixture and beat until smooth
Finally, stir in the sour cream and vanilla
In a separate bowl, combine the nuts, confectioners' sugar and cinnamon
Spread half of the batter into the 9x9 inch pan
Sprinkle a layer of the nut mixture, then spread the remaining batter and top with the rest of the nut mixture
Spread the melted butter over the top
Bake for 1 hour in the preheated oven, until cake springs back to the touch
